comments: He is a great teacher,some students think he goes off on tangents but his discusssions are related to the material most of the time they are alternative interpretations or a different perspective on the subject matter. When he does not have an answer he offers his perspective to get you thinking although he is extremely knowledgeable.

On 2nd thought, Prof Heim tend to go off tangent a lot. Also he doesn\'t like when people ask him irrelevant Qs because he would get nervous and won\'t know the answer. It seems his grading is subjective and NOT fair in a way particularly to essays. y i say that? cause he\'s NOT clear when he assigns a writing assignment! he doesn\'t knowhowtoteach

Class was wonderful! Prof. Heim is EXTREMELY KNOWLEDGABLE! HE KNOWS AT LEAST 7 LANGUAGES! HE CERTAINLY HELPED ME WITH MY WRITINGS AND WANTED ME TO SUCCEED! Though I got a B in the class(because EVERYTHING is essay, writings, including midterms&finals in which required 3 essays and 10 3-4 sentence ids), I feel that I LEARNED SO MUCH! So Heim is BEST
